Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have painful sores on my lips and in my mouth, genital area, and eyes, along with these areas being crusty and bleeding a bit.

This is the first time I've experienced these symptoms.

No, I haven't started any new medications or been diagnosed with any new medical conditions.

No, I haven't noticed any changes in my vision or sensitivity to light.

No, there is no history of autoimmune diseases in my family.
Final Diagnosis: Stevens-Johnson syndrome
